author: paulmbanks
title: Man United Left-Back Luke Shaw now walking again
text:
Tweet 
Manchester United left-back Luke Shaw is already walking again. Yes, he’s convalescing quite quickly. Shaw’s gruesome broken leg injury caught the attention of sports fans world wide this fall when he went down in a UEFA Champions League group stage match versus PSV Eindhoven. The injury made headlines all across the globe, and Shaw received a tremendous outpouring of support during what was an extremely emotional time for him. 
United Manager Louis van Gaal revealed that Luke Shaw has maintained a tremendous attitude throughout this process. 
Van Gaal also revealed that Shaw is now walking with a brace as he continues his rehabilitation from a broken leg, the Manchester Evening News report . 
“He is already here every day, walking with a brace and starting his rehabilitation. It is unbelievable,” said Van Gaal. 
“But he has a long way to go. At the moment, the progress is steep, but at the end it will be flat and that is difficult to maintain your mentality. But now he is fantastic.” 
The earliest Luke Shaw could return is March.
